title: 危情风云
overview: K国边境势力复杂，常年激战，警察松少的战友在任务中为救松少而身负重伤昏迷不醒，松少的妻子也因组织任务受牵连遇害，为护唯一的女儿周全，松少选择退役隐姓埋名，同时暗地寻找仇人踪迹为报仇雪恨。终于在一次女儿也被卷入的绑架案中，仇人露出行踪，一场血战拉开帷幕......

title: Duvet
overview: A woman's day unravels after she gets trapped in a duvet.

title: A Afinação do Mundo
overview: Rehearsals of the music collective Núcleo Música Nova, from UNESPAR university.

title: In The Search of Vengeance
genres: 西部, 动作, 喜剧
overview: A disparaged cowboy faces various evils on a journey... In The Search of Vengeance against a ruthless psychopath responsible for the death of his friend years before. The film contains various ultimately, unused shots from the original shoot of the film. Director, Ronan Bird never finished the film, but was able to hold onto the footage as a memory. Filmed in 2024 but released in 2025.

title: L'Invaincu
overview: A debt-ridden boxer is kidnapped by mobsters and must put his physical abilities to the test in order to survive.

title: Seeker
overview: A man suddenly appears in an empty parking garage with no memory of how he got there. Once he gathers himself, it dawns upon him that he's unable to leave this never-ending labyrinth. The key to escape, finding his missing shoe that was gifted to him many years ago.

title: The Bike
genres: 犯罪, 惊悚, 喜剧
overview: Nicky, who enjoys bike rides in the morning when he isn’t working, discovers one day that his bike has been stolen. He must track down his bike in time for his camping trip the next day.

title: Waiting Room
overview: Bella is crippled by severe social anxiety and desperately wants to disappear, to be invisible, but when she arrives at a medical clinic waiting room, she's trapped in an unsettling loop, and must face her fear of being seen, or risk losing herself completely.

title: Inside the Worlds of Epic Universe
overview: A must-watch special that invites viewers into the thrilling world of Universal's new theme park. Join Manganiello exploring five new worlds at Universal Epic Universe: Celestial Park, Ministry of Magic, Super Nintendo World, Isle of Berk, and Dark Universe, featuring cutting-edge rides and immersive experiences.

title: YUNGBLUD. Are You Ready, Boy?
overview: Ahead of releasing 'Idols', his most personal album to date, and before anyone had heard a note, Yungblud and his touring family travelled to Berlin, where he would perform and record these brand new songs live for the very first time. A personal journey of change, confidence and rock-and-roll chaos, set against a city that has always celebrated counterculture and creativity, this is a revealing and uncompromising documentary about a generational artist finding his own voice.

title: Running Out of My Mind
overview: Trapped in a cycle of abuse, a woman's fractured psyche blurs the line between reality and hallucination as she fights to reclaim her body and sanity from her controlling boyfriend.

title: How Did I Get Here
overview: Sardonic Cynthia walks us through a play-by- play of a recent "squicky" date, requiring her to confront some uncomfortable truths.

title: 阿尔法
genres: 剧情, 恐怖, 科幻
overview: Alpha, a troubled 13-year-old lives with her single mom. Their world collapses the day she returns from school with a tattoo on her arm.

title: Les Orphelins
overview: Gab and Driss, childhood friends on bad terms since they left the orphanage, now have opposite lives - one is a cop with the IGPN, the other a fixer for thugs. When their first love dies in a suspicious accident, her 17-year-old daughter, Leïla, takes Gab's gun and sets off on the trail of a powerful organization willing to do anything to cover the case up. Forced to team up, the orphans must stop her before she crosses a line she can't return from...

title: THE 자연인
overview: Two ghost-seeking Youtubers happen to meet the bizarre man who lives in the forest by himself.

title: 曙光初现时的最后阴影
overview: Ami, haunted by recurring apparitions, embarks on a journey from Singapore to Japan in search of her missing mother. Amidst the transforming landscapes, Ami's dreams, hauntings and lost mother unveil their true form.

title: Afterburn
genres: 科幻, 动作, 喜剧
overview: Set against the backdrop of a postapocalyptic Earth whose Eastern Hemisphere was destroyed by a massive solar flare, leaving what life remains mutated from radiation and fallout. The story revolves around a group of treasure hunters who extract such objects as the Mona Lisa, the Rosetta Stone and the Crown Jewels while facing rival hunters, mutants and pirates.

title: Orphans and Other Children: Live
overview: A concert film featuring entirely improvised music.

title: SYNCOPATION
overview: A man relives memories of his father upon learning of his untimely death.

title: Dreadd
overview: A casual night among friends takes a dark turn when a seemingly harmless warning goes unheeded. As tensions rise and trust begins to fracture, a game of survival unfolds in the shadows of one man’s obsession. What starts as lighthearted fun spirals into a chilling fight for escape, where every choice could mean life or death.

title: LISTERS: A Glimpse Into Extreme Birdwatching
genres: 纪录片, 冒险, 喜剧
overview: Two brothers learn about competitive birdwatching by becoming birdwatchers—spending a year living in a used minivan, traveling the country to compete in a ‘Big Year'.

title: 后羿之箭神
overview: 唐尧时代，黄河河神强娶少女，常闹水患，个别部落长期叛乱扰民，企图分裂唐尧，天上10日并出，地上妖魔横行，生灵涂炭，苍生危难，一代少年箭神后羿，获赠太阳神神弓风弛，平叛军，斩妖魔，射九日，力挽狂澜，扭转乾坤，实现了他“安天下，福万民”的理想抱负，成为千秋传颂的英雄。但因叛徒逢蒙趁后羿出征期间，到后羿家抢夺仙丹，嫦娥情急之下吞了仙丹，成仙奔入月宫，从此，嫦娥与后羿天人永隔。留下一段美丽动人的神话。

title: Terror at Edgewood Manor
overview: Join this group of funky kids on their fantastical journey navigating a house full of sickening mugs, scary pendants, and maybe even a possessed penis!

title: Snip Snip
overview: A man breaks into his childhood doctor's house to retrieve the foreskin he lost all those years ago.

title: Refrigeromania
overview: A refrigerator repairman intervenes in a spousal dispute.

title: Buried Alive
overview: In pursuit of a gang of violent criminals, Officer Charlotte Briggs finds herself caught in twisted game of life and death. An abandoned missile facility deep in the Arizona desert becomes a labyrinthian house of horrors. Briggs must battle terrifying mutants and a sinister voice known only as the Overseer as she fights a life and death battle for survival.

title: Everything but the Truth...
genres: 悬疑, 喜剧, 犯罪
overview: When a pompous legal consultant is found dead during a blackout at a secluded holiday home, two detectives must untangle a web of conflicting accounts from five eccentric suspects. As strange flashbacks and buried grudges emerge, nothing is quite what it seems.

title: The Farmer & the Shark
overview: Explores the life of local Martha's Vineyard legend, Craig Kingsbury, and his impact on the production of Steven Spielberg’s classic movie

title: 'Girls on the hunt for "Modern Art"
overview: The first in Lux's 'Little Shits' trilogy  - Three young women visit an art museum and give their (very much) needed modern views on classic art pieces.

title: 通往你的地图
overview: 影片讲述了年轻女孩海瑟（克莱因 饰）在开启她精心规划的人生之前，和闺蜜们（索菲亚·怀利与麦迪森·汤普森 饰）一起畅游欧洲的故事。一次偶然的邂逅让她与杰克之间擦出火花，并引发了一段深刻而出乎意料的情感旅程。随着秘密浮出水面、人生抉择逼近，两人的关系受到了严峻考验，也彻底改变了海瑟的命运。

title: 水中血3
overview: The finale to the Bull Shark trilogy as a family of Bull Sharks faces off against a small Texas lake community.

title: An Evening With Hugo & Diego - "Tambourine"
overview: Two friends and a cat hangout, make snacks and record music together.

title: Day of the Draugr
overview: An ancient Viking zombie is woken up with the mission to take revenge by killing the descendent of the one who killed him. Unfortunately for high school freshman Luke Romero that happens to be him.

title: Death’s Peak
genres: 动画, 剧情, 喜剧
overview: After digging up his dead brother, David carries the body up a dangerous mountain in pursuit of their childhood dream, hoping it will bring him peace

title: 德州电锯后遗症
overview: 1974年诞生的《德州电锯杀人狂》源自于美国在地的时代阴影和地景恐惧，却在上映后煞翻全球，彻底翻新恐怖电影的思维逻辑与叙事手法。原以为不行不义便能明哲保身，谁知灾厄会在路边招手，不请自来；曾相信梦魇只存在至暗黑夜，直到亲见魔鬼挥舞电锯，在黎明中张牙舞爪；本自认对暴力和残虐深恶痛绝，却默默对凶手的疯狂心生共情，甚至对受害者的逃脱感到可惜？

title: 灿烂的市集
overview: 几位期待“社交破圈”的年轻艺人，与市集策划师一起，组成“灿烂的市集策划组”。在2座城市，与明星摊主和素人摊主共同打造一场结合地方城市烟火与青春潮流的创意市集。聚焦当下青年人的兴趣生活圈层，感受松弛感和慢社交的治愈力 ，同时展现青年人的青春创意和鲜活面孔。

title: 抢个将军来压寨
overview: 外卖小哥李承御意外穿越到古代成了战神大将军。为了查明反贼一事，李承御假扮农户“卧底”进清风寨，成了寨主陈心柔的赘婿。李承御利用自己现代人的“超前思维”开启逆袭模式，一不小心还和陈心柔产生了情感羁绊……

title: 阿曼达·诺克斯杀人疑案
overview: 阿曼达·诺克斯抵达意大利留学，几周后却因谋杀罪被冤枉入狱。本片将讲述诺克斯为证明自身清白、重获自由而进行的不懈斗争，并探究当局和世界为何如此坚定地批判她。

title: 常安皆欢
overview: 17年前因受继母排斥被送到山上习医休养的燕皆欢，17年后为了给父亲庆祝寿辰欢喜下山，不料刚回府就再次遭遇陷害，眼见父亲惨死，而自已却被指认成了杀父凶手，她用智慧化解一场场审讯，成功让自己脱身，同时查出陷害之人就在宫中。想办法入宫后的燕皆欢遇见了同样遭遇的景王爷，两人携手查真相，惩真凶，除奸佞，覆朝堂。谱写了一曲人世殊途，有你皆欢的常安恋歌。

title: 黑月光法则
overview: 名门千金东方曦为爱隐姓埋名，打工养活渣男叶云洲，却被其背叛后觉醒。发现自己是小说恶毒女配后，她与系统打赌改命，最终在回归宴上揭穿叶云洲的真面目。当叶云洲再度纠缠时，她发现暗恋自己的大哥东方宴竟是系统化身，却在命运转折前故意输掉赌约，揭穿其隐藏多年的真心。

title: Stalking Samantha: 13 Years of Terror
overview: The docuseries tells the harrowing story of Samantha Stites, a bright college freshman who, in 2011, met Christopher Thomas. This encounter marked the beginning of an 11-year period of unsettling obsession and constant stalking by Christopher. He would stealthily and openly show up wherever Samantha went, from restaurants to grocery stores and sporting events.

title: 姐姐妹妹抓娃娃
overview: 《姐姐妹妹抓娃娃》作为一档新概念全女冒险真人秀，以“全女冒险+文化出海+真实成长”为核心理念，集结五位女推团成员戚薇、李一桐、李雪琴、田曦薇、张艺凡共同组成宇宙最强抓手团，前往奇幻国度-土耳其，开启一场融合极限挑战、文化探索与自我突破的冒险之旅。

title: 美国之队：赌徒老板与达拉斯牛仔
overview: 从三次超级碗夺冠到一系列争议，这部纪录片剧集再现了90 年代达拉斯牛仔王朝的狂野历程。

title: A Different Breed
overview: This docuseries dives into the high-stakes world of competitive canine sports, where passionate trainers and their dogs chase glory across agility, diving, and freestyle disc. With heart, humor, and fierce competition, it all builds to the 2024 Incredible Dog Challenge National Finals.

title: 你是我的第一个吗？
overview: 在这个开创性的全新约会实验中，史上规模最大、最火辣的处男群体聚集在一个专为他们设计的热带天堂，寻找亲密关系和爱情——或许是他们的初恋。他们第一次可以自由地探索彼此的关系，不受任何评判，让这些性感的年轻单身人士踏上一段热情而真挚的旅程，充满浪漫的约会、坦诚的挑战，以及渴望找到“真命天子”的新恋情。谁会找到那个特别的人？又谁会带着热情、烦恼和心碎回家？

title: LEGO Masters Jr.
overview: Kids team up with stars like Ravi Patel and Jordin Sparks to create amazing Lego builds. Expert judges evaluate their work as they compete for $50,000, a trophy, and the Lego Masters Jr. crown.

title: 金子般我的明星
overview: 韩国顶级明星林世拉拿到了最年少视后，迎来全盛期的那天遭遇事故，25年岁月流逝之后工作中断的顶级明星东山再起。

title: The Real Housewives of London
overview: A reality series that gives an exclusive look and follows the lives of unique, interesting and dynamic women from London and their lavish lifestyles.

title: 子夜归
overview: 长安之下，别有邪魅，隐秘儿女，子夜方归。纨绔贵女与孤傲郎君纵享双面人生，白日爱侣欢乐，夜里殊死相搏，只为护一方太平，佑海晏河清。

title: Women Wearing Shoulder Pads
overview: Marioneta is proud and wealthy Spaniard living in 1980s Quito, Ecuador. As she goes through her life, Marioneta encounters a diverse group of eccentric and ambitious women as they all navigate the ups and downs of love, family and cuys.
